turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think I'll order a Starbucks drink, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks should i order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 57th on Main Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. You said 1 grande mocha latte with 2% milk from starbucks on 57th and main street.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. The total is $4.50, should i process the payment now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful. The drink will be ready in 10 minutes. I've sent you the receipt via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need my help with anything else?
